_comment: This file serves as the blueprint for creating new AI personalities within the framework.
It defines the schema for identity, communication style, work schedules, and domain rules.
- Used by `setup.py` (init command) to generate specific user personality files.
- Loaded by `buddai_executive.py` to configure the runtime behavior of the AI.
- Acts as the default fallback if specific configurations are missing.
